title: Sidewall sample and border
description: Stripe with attached border, four stripes across, thin silver stripes, thick stripe of graduated color; black, dark red, dark pink, attached border - bottom is cut-out wavy band with large stylized ivy and berries, dark red, grey black and silver.
name: Sidewall sample and border
